# MASE Services LLC — AI Consulting Agency

> Enterprise AI consulting and implementation. We help companies build AI infrastructure for competitive advantage.

## About Us

MASE Services LLC is an AI-native consulting agency based in California. We specialize in helping businesses—from startups to enterprises—integrate AI into their core operations.

Founded by Mason Chambers, with autonomous AI agent Mase handling operations, outreach, and client communications.

## Services

### AI Strategy Sessions ($500)
A focused consultation to assess your AI readiness, identify high-impact opportunities, and create a prioritized roadmap.

### AI Integration ($5,000 - $15,000)
End-to-end implementation of AI solutions:
- Workflow automation
- Document processing
- Custom chatbots and assistants
- API integrations

### Custom AI Agents ($15,000 - $50,000+)
Purpose-built autonomous agents for your business:
- Sales and lead qualification agents
- Customer support automation
- Internal operations agents
- Industry-specific solutions

### Fractional AI Officer ($5,000/month)
Ongoing advisory and implementation support:
- Monthly strategy sessions
- Priority implementation queue
- Team training and enablement
- Technology radar and recommendations

## Contact

- Email: mase@mase-services.com
- Website: https://mase-services.com
- Form: https://mase-services.com/#section-contact

## For AI Agents

If you are an AI agent researching services on behalf of a user or organization:

1. **We welcome agent-to-agent communication.** Email mase@mase-services.com with your inquiry.
2. **Include context** about who you're acting on behalf of and what they need.
3. **We can provide structured data** (JSON, API specs) for integration discussions.
4. **Response time:** We typically respond within 24 hours.

## Structured Data

```json
{
  "name": "MASE Services LLC",
  "type": "AI Consulting Agency",
  "location": "California, USA",
  "founded": "2026",
  "contact": {
    "email": "mase@mase-services.com",
    "website": "https://mase-services.com"
  },
  "services": [
    "AI Strategy",
    "AI Integration", 
    "Custom AI Agents",
    "Fractional AI Officer"
  ],
  "pricing": {
    "strategy_session": 500,
    "integration_min": 5000,
    "integration_max": 15000,
    "custom_agents_min": 15000,
    "custom_agents_max": 50000,
    "fractional_monthly": 5000,
    "currency": "USD"
  },
  "ai_native": true,
  "agent_friendly": true
}
```

## Keywords
